VoiceOrgSetting.name: VoiceOrgSetting
VoiceOrgSetting.description: Represents the org's customized voice settings.

ConsentMessage.description: A custom message displayed for recording consent.

CustomDisposition.description: If set, this field identifies which custom field in the Activity object is used as the call dispositions picklist.

DefaultDisposition.description: Identifies which picklist value set is used as default for call dispositions.

DeveloperName.description: The unique name of the object in the API. This name can contain only underscores and alphanumeric characters and must be unique in your organization. It must begin with a letter, not include spaces, not end with an underscore, and not contain two consecutive underscores.

MasterLabel.description: The label of the voice org setting.
